issues.description: Confusing double negation in condition `if (!old == !val) return;` could lead to unexpected behavior
Bug in insertBefore call: uses 'options.after.node' but should use 'options.after' since that's what's checked in the condition
Regex pattern `/[^\u200b]/` may not correctly detect all non-zero-width space characters
closeOnBlur event handler may cause unexpected behavior if evt.relatedTarget is null
Potential memory leak if component is destroyed without properly cleaning up event listeners
Position calculation for negative direction movement could create invalid positions
Ruler positioning calculation doesn't account for editor padding
closingTagExists function doesn't properly handle nested tags with the same name
List numbering logic doesn't handle complex nested lists correctly
Bracket matching logic may fail with certain cursor positions and bracket combinations
Tag matching doesn't handle self-closing tags properly
Regex pattern `/\s/` may not handle all whitespace characters consistently across browsers
